Type.EDICTSYSTEMS: Customer will need to inform EDICT that they are using TrueCommerce.

FTPPartnerHosted_FTPPartnerHosted.TypeName: FTP - Partner Hosted --- FTP - Partner Hosted

Type.FTPPartnerHosted_FTPPartnerHosted: FTP Partner Hosted - TPS Must Complete Setup

FTPTCHosted_FTPTCHosted.TypeName: FTP - TC Hosted --- FTP - TC Hosted

Type.FTPTCHosted_FTPTCHosted: FTP TC Hosted - TPS Must Complete Setup
Type.SPS: Customer must submit form to SPS.
Type.Vendornet: VendorNet Connection. Imp Specialist will work with VendorNet and customer to establish the connection.
Type.VCommerce: Inform VCommerce to connect to TrueCommerce

FTPPartnerHosted_FTPTCHosted.TypeName: FTP - Partner Hosted --- FTP - TC Hosted (also called Push/Push)

Type.Promethean: FTP Partner Hosted--FTP Partner Hosted. The Trading Partner Specialists are responsible for these setups
Type.Hubspan: Customer must inform partner that they are using TrueCommerce
Type.iConnect: Must inform partner that customer using TrueCommerce
Type.Transplace: Inform Transplace to connect to TrueCommerce
Type.VirtualRain: Virtual Rain - TPS Must Complete Setup
